    • Method Detail

      • init

        public abstract void init(Coeus engine)
        Invoked by the engine when the server is first started. Until this operation completes players will not be accepted. Should contain semi time-consuming logic
        Parameters:
        engine - our game engine

      • begin

        public abstract void begin()
        Invoked when we have the required players to begin the game. Should contain game logic.

      • end

        public abstract void end()
        Called when a match is over and the server will be shutting down within a short time period.
